summary: Implements a NeMo ASR model that ensembles several speech‑recognition models and computes confidence scores for the transcriptions. It provides a specification class to translate confidence‑related settings into a configuration object and integrates with NeMo’s confidence utilities to aggregate logits, apply confidence methods, and output both the decoded text and associated confidence measures.
business_intent: Enable applications to achieve more accurate and reliable speech‑to‑text results by leveraging model ensembles and confidence estimation, allowing downstream systems to make informed decisions based on the certainty of transcriptions.
